//Print even numbers using for
public class EvenNumbersFor {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub 
		for (int i = 2; i <= 10; i += 2) {
			System.out.println(i);
		}
        
		// even numbers using while
       
public class EvenNumbersWhile {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		 int i = 2;
	        while (i <= 10) {
	            System.out.println(i);
	            i += 2;
	        }

      //Even numbers using dowhile

public class EvenNumbersDoWhile {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i = 2;
        do {
            System.out.println(i);
            i += 2;
        } while (i <= 10);
	}

}

Output:
2
4
6
8
10
